card_text: You can only use each of the following effects of "Therion "Lily" Borea" once per turn.$N●You can target 1 "Therion" monster or 1 Plant monster in your GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, equip that monster to this card.$N●You can send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY; add 1 "Therion" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.$NA "Therion" monster equipped with this card gains 700 ATK, also it can activate the 2nd effect listed above as if it were "Therion "Lily" Borea".
